message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered my budget and I believe I can offer $10500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'll consider $11000, but that's as low as I can go.
Respectfully, Alice, I've done some research and I believe $10500 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
